activities: IIL provides corporate professional training services worldwide, including the EU. We do collect PII as required to sell and to deliver the services. IIL does not sell, rent or otherwise release the PII to any third parties. We do keep such PII in our data bases for statistical, historical, and marketing purposes. We respect the “opt out” requirements in all our marketing efforts and have, on staff, an employee responsible for keeping our databases up to date with respect to such.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online, manually processed data and human resources data
recoursemech: For human resources data: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC); For all other types of data: American Arbitration Association (AAA), ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program
